original: Ågren, Per Gustaf, direktör, kapten, Göteborg, f. 20/6/98 i Gbg av grossh. Axel Hugo Å. o. Louise Schmidt. G. 28 m. Märtha Winqwist. Barn: Louise f. 31, Birgitta 33, Kristina 35, Ann-Charlotte 39, Axel Hugo 42. — Stud:-ex. v. Gbgs h. real 18, of;f :ex. 20, AIHIS allm. art:kurs 23, DHG 31. Fänrik v. Göta art:reg. 20, löjtn. 24, kapten i res. 35. Anst. v. Axel H. Ågren A-B i Gbg s’ed. 31, dir. där sed. 34. Styr:led. i Gbgs Sand A-B, i Sodafabr. Försäljn. A-B, i Gbgs spar^b., i Ränte- o. Kap :-försäkr :anst. i Gbg, ordf. i Gbgs o. Boh. 1. skytteför<b. fr. 38, Skytteföi^b. ord. repr. i Bef :ut!b :förb. fr. 38, led. av en mängd komm. o. ndr inom skytterör., ledare f. SM på armégev. i Gbg 38, f. Gbgs o. Boh. 1. skytteförib. jub:tävl. i Gbg 43, v. ordf. i Res:off :sällsk. i Gbg 37-45, ordlf. sed. 46, styr:led. i Sv. arméns o. flygv. res :off :förb. sed. 46. Holbbies: skytte, ridsp. RVO, Skytteförb. öv:-styr. ftjSM, Gbgs o. Boh. 1. skytteförb. ftjGM, RFinlLolkl 47, FMM f. hum. verks., Finl. res :off :förb. Hed-Gt, De Vernepl. off. foren. i Oslo Hed-Gt.
translated: Ågren, Per Gustaf, director, captain, Gothenburg, b. 20/6/98 in Gbg to wholesaler Axel Hugo Å. and Louise Schmidt. Married on 28 m. to Märtha Winqwist. Children: Louise b. 31, Birgitta 33, Kristina 35, Ann-Charlotte 39, Axel Hugo 42. — Graduated from Gbg secondary school in 1918, passed officer's exam in 1920, completed general art course at AIHIS in 1923, DHG in 1931. Ensign of Göta artillery regiment in 1920, lieutenant in 1924, captain in reserve in 1935. Employed by Axel H. Ågren AB in Gothenburg since 1931, director there since 1934. Board member of Gbg Sand AB, Sodafabr. Sales AB, Gbg savings bank, Ränte- och Kapitalförsäkringsanstalten in Gothenburg, chairman of Gbg and Boh. 1st shooting association since 1938, regular representative of shooting association in Befolkningsskyddsförbundet since 1938, member of numerous committees and boards within shooting associations, leader of Swedish Championship on army rifle in Gothenburg in 1938, organizer of Gbg and Boh. 1st shooting association jubilee competition in Gothenburg in 1943, vice chairman of Reserve Officers' Society in Gothenburg from 1937-1945, chairman since 1946, board member of Swedish Army and Air Force Reserve Officers' Association since 1946. Hobbies: shooting, equestrian sports. RVO, shooting association higher staff special medal, Gbg and Boh. 1st shooting association higher gold medal, RFinlLolkl 47, FMM for humanitarian work, Finnish Reserve Officers' Association Hedersguldtacken, The Vernepliktig officer's association in Oslo Hedersguldtacken.
